items.content_html: Universal Resource Finder A global platform designed to help users discover free, high-quality resources across various categories like technology, design, education, and business. This lightweight and community-driven website makes it easy to find tools, templates, courses, and more from trusted sources. Key Features: Powerful Search: Instantly

items.content_html: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

items.content_html: ContactSync is a lightweight mobile app designed to help small businesses easily manage and synchronize their contacts. By providing a straightforward interface and efficient contact management, ContactSync aims to simplify your workflow.

items.content_html: A lightweight RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) implementation in Node.js and TypeScript. This project combines ChromaDB for vector storage with Ollama LLMs to create a simple, efficient system for generating contextually relevant responses based on retrieved information
items.title: Liakhov/RAG-API: A lightweight RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) implementation in Node.js and TypeScript. This project combines ChromaDB for vector storage with Ollama LLMs to create a simple, efficient system for generating contextually relevant responses based on retrieved information

items.content_html: 📚 Quiz App is a lightweight and interactive web-based quiz application that presents multiple-choice questions to users. The app keeps track of scores, allows navigation between questions, and includes a timer.

items.content_html: SERAUI is a lightweight UI library offering ready-to-use components that can be easily copied and pasted into any project, making UI design faster and more efficient with minimal setup.
